backend/main.mo: Actor implements authorization, school and user profile storage, and daily report management with scoring and access control.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence entries listing related frontend files, components, and test IDs for three tracked features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: A mapping of frontend file paths to short functional descriptions used for build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base setup defining light and dark theme CSS variables and applying global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app with root container and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling authentication, role-based routing, and admin view switching.
frontend/src/components/admin/ActiveScho: Displays searchable, filterable list of active schools with loading/error states and an edit dialog trigger.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminSumma: Shows summary cards for active school count and daily report submissions with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/components/admin/AnalyticsS: Generates charts for daily report trends and completion percentages using fetched report data.
frontend/src/components/admin/DailyProgr: Renders badges showing completion status of daily report categories with safe checks for scores and photos.
frontend/src/components/admin/EditSchool: Provides a modal form for editing a school’s details and submitting updates to the backend.
frontend/src/components/admin/KepsekProf: Form for registering a new school profile for a principal, including validation and save operation.
frontend/src/components/admin/Monitoring: Displays sorted principal daily reports with scores, status, and detail view access for a selected date.
frontend/src/components/admin/ReportDeta: Shows detailed daily report info including photo, times, and score breakdown in a dialog.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Reusable app header with logo, title, logout handling, and optional child elements.
frontend/src/components/kepsek/Attendanc: Handles image selection, validation, preview, and upload progress for attendance photos.
frontend/src/components/kepsek/DailyRepo: Form for principals to submit daily reports with times, photo, task completion, and automatic scoring.
frontend/src/components/kepsek/ProfileSe: Form dialog for setting up school profile details such as name, region, and principal.
frontend/src/components/kepsek/TodaySubm: Displays today's submitted report with photo, score breakdown, and an edit option.
frontend/src/components/StatusPills.tsx: UI badge components for score display, submission status, and category score indicators.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and helpers for managing Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and auth-client configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating role, school, and daily report data using the authenticated actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS layers and theme variables for light and dark mode styling.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function to merge Tailwind and conditional class names.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AccessDeniedPage.tsx: Displays an access denied message with a logout button that clears identity and cached queries.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard showing summaries, charts, active schools, and monitoring table with date selection.
frontend/src/pages/AdminKepsekManagement: Admin page for registering and managing school principal profiles, including a form toggle and guidance alert.
frontend/src/pages/KepsekDashboardPage.t: React page that loads the principal’s school and today’s report, handles errors, and shows either the daily form or a summary depending on submission state.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login screen that authenticates users via Internet Identity and displays a styled sign‑in card.
frontend/src/utils/dayKey.ts: Provides helpers to normalize dates to start‑of‑day nanosecond keys for daily report storage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration with custom colors, container settings, extended animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata summarizing app purpose, architecture notes, known issues, and implemented feature records.
